nodes.text: Pod Seventeen was a factory compartment of the Sith Lord Odion's space station The Spike during the Second Charge Matrica in 1032 BBY. This factory was used to build kinetic corruptors, large machines that were used to extract baradium and which were capable of generating large explosions. A Verpine overseer was in charge of the station and the labor droid GAD-3 also worked there. During the Raid on The Spike, parts of the factory were damaged during a duel between Odion and the Jedi Knight Kerra Holt.
